channel.title: My client is pissing me off must have a look!
channel.description:
Error occurred during initialization of VM java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object Press any key to continue . . .
thats what i get when i run my client
this is whats inside my client @echo off title Multiscape "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

item.title: My client is pissing me off must have a look!
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

[quote=“jake.bellotti, post:3, topic:442615”]~Quick Tip~

-Xmx300mb
Means the server only gets 300mb of ram. Change that to something higher as that is a very little amount for a server.[/quote]
it’s the client. and since the cache is not more than 100mb (for pi), this isn’t necessary.

Read full topic
item.source: My client is pissing me off must have a look!
